properties.Name: FinancialStatementType
properties.Description:
The type of financial statement.

Ex:
IFRS
- Statement of Financial Position
- Statement of Comprehensive Income
- Statement of Cash Flows
- Statement of Changes in Equity

GAAP
- Balance Sheet
- Income Statement ("Profit & Loss")
- Statement of Retained Earnings
- Statement of Cash Flows

FERC
- Comparative Balance Sheet
- Statement of Income and Retained Earnings
- Statement of Cash Flows
- Statement of Accumulated Comprehensive Income and Hedging Activities

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Accounting Framework.
